html: Saddened to hear of the passing of Senator Richard Lugar, a true statesman whose decades of public service left an indelible mark on Indiana, our nation and the world. In this divided political era, let’s ensure his example of bipartisanship and public service lives on in us.

html: Another day, another deadly attack on people of faith, this time at a synagogue in Poway, California — and most likely motivated by hate. I grieve for and with all affected by this tragedy and pledge once more to work to end the global epidemic of violence and bigotry.

html: If successful, the #GOP’s Texas v. US Lawsuit would: Rip away protections from people w/ pre-existing conditions Take coverage from millions Let insurers put lifetime and annual limits on coverage. That’s why I’m voting today to oppose this effort and #ProtectOurCare.
text:
If successful, the #GOP’s Texas v. US Lawsuit would: 

Rip away protections from people w/ pre-existing conditions 
Take coverage from millions 
Let insurers put lifetime and annual limits on coverage. 

That’s why I’m voting today to oppose this effort and #ProtectOurCare.

text:
The House just passed @JoaquinCastrotx's resolution terminating #Trump's egregious and reckless emergency declaration.
 
We can't let him build his ineffective wall. We won't let him disrespect the separation of powers.
 
Our country and its ideals must be protected.

text:
Here’s our simple message to Attorney General Barr:

When Special Counsel Robert Mueller completes the investigation, make his report public. And turn the evidence over to Congress. Without delay and to the maximum extent permitted by law.

Our letter:pic.twitter.com/f00LVn88N1
